titleStmt.title: By the King, a proclamation for the more effectual discovery of Jesuits, and of all estates belonging to them, or to any popish priest, colledge, seminary, or other popish and superstitious foundation
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Bill, Thomas Newcomb, and Henry Hills ...,

notesStmt.note: "Given at our court at Whitehall the twelfth day of November, 1679. In the one and thirtieth year of our reign."
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
